title: The Lost Archives of Sadie Alexander
description: The work of our first Black economist was lost to history. Professor Nina Banks set out on a quest to find it. | Subscribe to our weekly newsletter here.
copyright: Copyright 2015-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: The Lost Archives of Sadie Alexander
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: The work of our first Black economist was lost to history. The story of what happened when Professor Nina Banks set out on a quest to rediscover it — a tale of economic archeology.
itunes:subtitle: The work of our first Black economist was lost to history. The story of what happened when Professor Nina Banks set out on a quest to rediscover it — a tale of economic archeology.
